text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

text: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.

text: A picture is worth a thousand words.

text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

text: A smile is the universal welcome.

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

text: Be the change you wish to see in the world.

text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

text: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
